description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Committee_ClassificationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Committee_ClassificationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Committee_ClassificationObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Unique Reference to the Committee Classification . Used to identify the Committee Classification Committee Classification to update. Leave blank on an Add.

Committee_Classification_Data.description: Unique Identifier for the committee classification. If not entered, one will be generated.
Committee Classification Name. Required for add.

validation.validation: Enter a unique Classification Name. The one you entered already exists.

Committee_Classification_Data.description: A boolean flag to set the committee classification inactive.

validation.validation: You can't activate this Classification, since it belongs to a inactive Classification Group.
